description: The Paurotis Palm (Acoelorrhaphe wrightii) is an amazing plant species native to the Everglades of Florida. It's a low-maintenance palm that can grow up to 25 feet tall. Its leaves are spectacular - long, thin, and fan-shaped. They have a unique, silver-green color that creates truly beautiful landscapes. The Paurotis is a hardy plant that can tolerate a wide range of temperatures and drought. It's also salt-tolerant, making it perfect for coastal areas. With its easy growth and attractive appearance, the Paurotis Palm is a great choice for any landscaper looking to add a bit of tropical flair to their outdoor spaces.
